channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Cloud Plugins -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Cloud Plugins -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-42547|2024-08-04T03:38:48.826Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- out-of-the-box
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Out-of-the-Box prior to 1.20.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-42546|2024-08-04T03:38:49.264Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- use-your-drive
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Use-Your-Drive prior to 1.18.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-42548|2024-08-04T03:38:48.790Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- share-one-drive
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Share-one-Drive prior to 1.15.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-42549|2024-08-04T03:38:49.191Z -- wp%20cloud%20plugins -- lets-box
item.description: Insufficient Input Validation in the search functionality of Wordpress plugin Lets-Box prior to 1.15.3 allows unauthenticated user to craft a reflected Cross-Site Scripting attack.
